mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (sender_id, recipient_id, content, timestamp, is_read, is_system_message) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{recipientId}, #{content}, #{timestamp}, #{isRead}, #{isSystemMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT cm.*, u1.username as sender_username, u2.username as recipient_username FROM chat_message cm LEFT JOIN users u1 ON cm.sender_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON cm.recipient_id = u2.id WHERE (cm.sender_id = #{userId1} AND cm.recipient_id = #{userId2}) OR (cm.sender_id = #{userId2} AND cm.recipient_id = #{userId1}) ORDER BY cm.timestamp DESC LIMIT #{limit}
